item.description:
Learn to tune to your own intuition and develop it, to reliably access divine guidance for your life. Learn to tune to your own intuition and develop it, to reliably access divine guidance for your life.

An interactive seminar presented by Master Teacher and Mystic, Mother Clare Watts, author of Giving Birth to God: A Woman's Path to Enlightenment. Light lunch included.

Cost: $35

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: Intuition as a Spiritual Sense
